publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League.
S1M-1855 Congratulations to Cove Rangers (lodged on 23 April 2001) Michael Matheson*
S1M-1855 Congratulations to Cove Rangers (lodged on 23 April 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Alex Salmond*

S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Alex Salmond
S1M-1855 Congratulations to Cove Rangers (lodged on 23 April 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-1855 Congratulations to Cove Rangers (lodged on 23 April 2001) Mr Brian Monteith*, Irene McGugan*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-1855 Congratulations to Cove Rangers (lodged on 23 April 2001) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Brian Monteith, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr David Davidson
S1M-1855 Congratulations to Cove Rangers (lodged on 23 April 2001) Ms Sandra White*

S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Brian Monteith, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Ms Sandra White
S1M-1855 Congratulations to Cove Rangers (lodged on 23 April 2001) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Brian Monteith, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Jamie McGrigor

S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Brian Monteith, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Jamie McGrigor

S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Brian Monteith, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Jamie McGrigor

S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Brian Monteith, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Jamie McGrigor
S1M-1855 Congratulations to Cove Rangers (lodged on 23 April 2001) Richard Lochhead*

S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Brian Monteith, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Richard Lochhead

S1M-1855 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Cove Rangers—That the Parliament congratulates Cove Rangers FC on winning the Highland League title for the first time and wishes them well in their plans for a new stadium and possible application to the Scottish Football League. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Brian Monteith, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Richard Lochhead
